snippet: The New York Times’s staff scours the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday’s selections include Facebook at the DefCon hacker conference and criticism of sexually charged advertisements for Motorola’s new smartphone.
abstract: The New York Times’s staff scours the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday’s selections include Facebook at the DefCon hacker conference and criticism of sexually charged advertisements for Motorola’s new smartphone.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Facebook at DefCon and Selling the Moto X With Innuendo
